nameless.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a nameless person is someone whose name is not known
nameless.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the work of some nameless 13th-century writer
nameless.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a nameless thing does not have a name
nameless.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He lay in a nameless grave.
nameless.translation[0].definitions[2].d: nameless emotions are very strong and difficult to describe in words
nameless.translation[0].definitions[2].e: He managed to calm her nameless fears.
nameless.translation[0].definitions[3].d: too terrible to name or describe
